Key.Original: Activate system ACPL LooseHelmet, which allow to lose your weapon or helmet after being shot
Key.English: Activate system ACPL LooseHelmet, which allow to lose your weapon or helmet after being shot
Key.Polish: Aktywuj system ACPL LooseHelmet, który pozwala na utracenie broni lub hełmu po postrzale

Key.Original: Activate possibility to lose NVGs even when helmet is fasten
Key.English: Activate possibility to lose NVGs even when helmet is fasten
Key.Polish: Aktywuj możliwość utracenia noktowizji nawet jeśli hełm jest zapięty

Key.Original: Chance in % to lose helmet after being shot in head if helmet is not fasten
Key.English: Chance in % to lose helmet after being shot in head if helmet is not fasten
Key.Polish: Szansa w % na utratę hełmu po postrzale w głowę jeśli hełm nie jest zapięty

Key.Original: Chance in % to lose weapon after being shot in arm or hand if weapon is not fasten
Key.English: Chance in % to lose weapon after being shot in arm or hand if weapon is not fasten
Key.Polish: Szansa w % na utracenie broni po byciu postrzelonym w rękę bądź ramie jeżeli broń nie jest przypięta

Key.Original: Activate a chance for dropped item to be destroyed. If item is destroyed you will be not able to pick it up.
Key.English: Activate a chance for dropped item to be destroyed. If item is destroyed you will be not able to pick it up.
Key.Polish: Aktywuj szansę na zniszczenie upuszczonego przedmiotu. Jeśli przedmiot zostanie zniszczony nie będziesz wstanie go podnieść.

Key.Original: Chance in % to destroy dropped item. The chance is multiplied by velocity of bullet that been divided by 100.
Key.English: Chance in % to destroy dropped item. The chance is multiplied by velocity of bullet that been divided by 100.
Key.Polish: Szansa w % na zniszczenie przedmiotu. Szansa jest mnożona przez prędkość pocisku, która została podzielona przez 100.

Key.Original: Chance for picking up a weapon
Key.English: Chance for picking up a weapon

Key.Original: Chance for picking up a dropped weapon even if is not necessary.
Key.English: Chance for picking up a dropped weapon even if is not necessary.
Key.Polish: Szansa na podniesienie upuszczonej broni nawet jeśli nie jest to konieczne.

Key.Original: Chance for picking up a helmet
Key.English: Chance for picking up a helmet

Key.Original: Chance for picking up a dropped helmet.
Key.English: Chance for picking up a dropped helmet.

Key.Original: Chance for picking up a NVGs
Key.English: Chance for picking up a NVGs

Key.Original: Chance for picking up a dropped NVGs even if is not necessary.
Key.English: Chance for picking up a dropped NVGs even if is not necessary.
Key.Polish: Szansa na podniesienie upuszczonej noktowizji nawet jeśli nie jest to konieczne.

Key.Original: You have no place to pick up the item
Key.English: You have no place to pick up the item
Key.Polish: Nie masz miejsca aby podnieść przedmiot
